text: Abraão Lincoln Martins, or simply Lincoln (born 14 June 1983), is a Brazilian former football striker. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup Total Total 2007 Avispa Fukuoka J2 League 39 16 1 2 40 18 2008 Shonan Bellmare J2 League 16 5 0 0 16 5 2009 9 1 1 0 10 1 Country Japan Japan 64 22 2 2 66 24 Total Total Total 64 22 2 2 66 24 ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian-Japanese footballers
